identity.description:
Creates an embedding database from documents using OpenAI/Azure models, with FAISS vector index and SQLite storage.

Create a new embedding database from a collection of documents. Generates embeddings using OpenAI or Azure OpenAI models and stores them in a searchable database with FAISS vector index and SQLite metadata storage.
capabilities: generates embeddings using OpenAI or Azure OpenAI models
stores embeddings in FAISS vector index

action.description: Action to create database from documents

database_name.description: Name for the new database (must be unique)

documents.description: List of document texts to embed and store

metadata.description: Optional metadata for each document (same length as documents)

model.description: OpenAI/Azure OpenAI embedding model to use

purpose.model:
SentenceTransformer(
  (0): Transformer({'max_seq_length': 4096, 'do_lower_case': False, 'architecture': 'BertModel'})
  (1): Pooling({'word_embedding_dimension': 384, 'pooling_mode_cls_token': False, 'pooling_mode_mean_tokens': True, 'pooling_mode_max_tokens': False, 'pooling_mode_mean_sqrt_len_tokens': False, 'pooling_mode_weightedmean_tokens': False, 'pooling_mode_lasttoken': False, 'include_prompt': True})
  (2): Normalize()
)
